In a message dated 1/3/01 11:04:56 PM Eastern Standard Time, 
dph_of_rules@... writes:


> I did a trial run with friendly slime help above experience level 250 
> and every time the slime had negative values for both health and magic 
> energy.  Since I have defeated slime with experience level above 1000, 
> 

Using MY novice level knowledge of C, I'm guessing that the large bits used 
by a slime with such a high level of experience simply have a "0" in the 
place occupied by the negative/positive binary value. Of course, in front of 
that somewhere, there's a 1, but in that particular place, there's a 0. Just 
my 2 cents.

Sincerely,
Insanerest of AOL
